industrial.title: Industrial Automation
industrial.description: PLC programming, SCADA systems, HMI design, and industrial network solutions. We optimize your production processes to increase efficiency.

network.title: Network Solutions
network.description: Enterprise network infrastructure, wireless network systems, VPN solutions, and network security. We strengthen your business communication infrastructure.

server.title: Server Solutions
server.description: Server setup, virtualization, backup systems, disaster recovery, and load balancing. We keep your data secure.

security.title: Security Solutions
security.description: Cybersecurity, firewall management, penetration testing, and security consulting. We protect your business against cyber threats.

software.title: Custom Software Development
software.description: Web applications, mobile apps, desktop software, and API integrations. We create tailored solutions for your needs.

iot.title: IoT Solutions
iot.description: Sensor networks, data collection systems, remote monitoring, and control solutions. We integrate the Internet of Things into your business.

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.description: Infrastructure setup, management, and optimization on AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud platforms. We move your business to the cloud.

analytics.title: Data Analytics and BI
analytics.description: Big data analysis, business intelligence solutions, reporting, and dashboard design. We transform your data into value.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: Project management, technology consulting, digital transformation strategies, and training services. We're by your side with our expert team.

projectsPage.title: Our Projects
projectsPage.subtitle: Adding value to businesses with our innovative technology solutions

bentap.title: Innovative Business Communication
bentap.description: Bentap is a contactless digital business card solution powered by NFC technology for professionals. Strengthen your business connections with a single touch and prevent paper waste with an eco-friendly approach.

thismenu.title: Modern Restaurant Experience with Contactless Menus
thismenu.description: ThisMenu is a contactless, digital menu solution for restaurants and cafes. Customize your menu with various design options and provide customers with an unforgettable ordering experience.

benscreen.title: Smart Display Solution of the Digital Age
benscreen.description: Benscreen is an innovative display solution designed to meet the digital advertising and information needs of businesses. Showcase your brand dynamically and impressively with customizable content management.

bilpp.title: Seamless and Secure Payment Experience
bilpp.description: Bentu Payment System offers a secure and fast payment process through integration with various banks. While increasing customer satisfaction with its user-friendly interface and reliable transaction capacity, it simplifies financial transactions for businesses.

bilppgo.title: Shape Customer Experience with Instant Feedback
bilppgo.description: Survey Bentu is an AI-powered customer feedback platform. Gain deep insights into customer satisfaction with real-time analytics and improve your services accordingly.
